title: A Simple Blog
text:
My initial thoughts.
I followed the steps as were shown on the video on https://www.crumplab.com but I ran into a problem on downloading a package that wasnt on my computer despite all the updates.
No worries, I got it downloaded when I searched it up on pacages and it was there and the quarto blog popped up and it works.
I edited the blog and made my own post and wondered if gifs are possible since I think they’re considered an image. I am very glad that it works. I also didnt expect that if I typed the actual title of the gif that I gave it would actually show but, it did and even though its small I was very excited about it. Now im wondering if emojis work.

title: week 3 post
text:
Some questions

Be able to make a new .qmd document I am able to make a .qmd document, pretty easy.

I can create a new .qmd document by clicking the green plus icon under the word file on top left.

Be able to render a .qmd document

Yep just press render or render website.

Explain the difference between the source editor view and visual editor view in Rstudio.

Source view shows everything as plain text in markdown which can be rendered in visual to display other forms of format. For example in visual this clickable link Google is actually (https://www.google.com) in source view with “[Google]” in front of the Parenthesis.

Be able to insert simple markdown plain text (headers, lists, paragraphs), and render the document.

title: A Simple Blog
text:
My initial thoughts.
I followed the steps as were shown on the video on https://www.crumplab.com but I ran into a problem on downloading a package that wasnt on my computer despite all the updates.
No worries, I got it downloaded when I searched it up on pacages and it was there and the quarto blog popped up and it works.
I edited the blog and made my own post and wondered if gifs are possible since I think they’re considered an image. I am very glad that it works. I also didnt expect that if I typed the actual title of the gif that I gave it would actually show but, it did and even though its small I was very excited about it. Now im wondering if emojis work.

title: Post With Code

title: Some tips and Notes
text:
Some of my notes that I will be updating here and there in case I forget anything
use ## in front of words to make bold title
Using ** with any text in between will make italicized
Double it and it makes texts bold
Triple is and it makes texts bold and italicized
Quadruple it and is doesnt make anything ****see****
1:5 gives u every number between 1 and 5
as.numeric(c(“1”,“2”,“3”)) converts those “texts” back into numerical numbers so “1” will be a text and 1 will be a numeric
rep(0,11) means 0 is made 11 times

"ctrl+alt+I makes this little section"

[1] "ctrl+alt+I makes this little section"



5+5

[1] 10

5+2

[1] 7

"i can assign numbers with words/letters"

[1] "i can assign numbers with words/letters"

b<-1

"5 random number between 1-0"

[1] "5 random number between 1-0"

random=runif(5,0,1)

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
